name: com.readyplayerme.core-ubiq-fork
description: This is a fork of com.readyplayerme.core(v1.3.3) which removes built-in packaging and update requests. This is a temporary fix as later version of com.readyplayerme.core cannot import HalfBody avatars. Original package by ReadyPlayerMe. Original readme: Ready Player Me Core is responsible for module management and setting up the SDK for first time use.
